attributes.action: All Frontline services employees financially rewarded
attributes.additional_details: Because the strong support and efforts that has been shown through the whole pandemic keeping the country moving, putting their own lives at risk, as these employees cannot work from home to keep safe, deserve to be substantially financially rewarded for their efforts from the government and recognition
attributes.background: All frontline services including.. Lorry drivers, NHS, shop/factory workers, waste collectors, street cleaning, drivers and PA's who transport vulnerable children to and from school to be financially rewarded for the continuing efforts and contributions puttting themselves at risk for the country

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559833
